EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114.See you Wednesday - non VIP
EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder - Pivotal UK Launch Party
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline PIVOTAL UK LAUNCH PARTY {{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
Just a friendly reminder about the upcoming Pivotal UK Launch party this Wednesday, March 5th. Come hungry, thirsty & ready to celebrate.
Please contact ateslia@gopivotal.com <mailto:ateslia@gopivotal.com> if you have any questions. No dress code in effect.
Hope to see you there!
REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114PivotalUK.html> McQUEEN <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/> <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/>55-61 TABERNACLE STREET, EC2A 4AA, WEDNESDAY, MARCH 5TH, 6:30PM - 9:30PM REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114PivotalUK.html>
